com.mnnit.tutorspoint

Class MainLayoutController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mnnit.tutorspoint.MainLayoutController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public final class MainLayoutController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The controller of the main layout.

    The main layout consists of a tabpane that wraps a simple login screen whose control is defined in LoginLayoutController class.
